summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4313 for the improvement of 8th Avenue North, from McGraw Street to Wheeler Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51172, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
